emerging: The processes that support Impact Management are partially defined within the Impact Management unit.
expanding: Processes within the Impact Management unit are defined.
optimising: Processes across the organisation are defined.
mature: Processes are clearly understood across the organisation.

emerging: The processes that support Impact Management are not integrated into the overall organisational value chain.
optimising: Processes are under review based on lessons learned thus far.
mature: Processes are continuously improved using insights gained from measurement.
